note.p: German-born merchant in New Zealand. Married Harriet Taylor in Manchester in 1847. School teacher in Salford, 1851. Naturalised in New Zealand, 1855. Died in Australia, 1882. Friend of Julius von Haast and Ferdinand Hochstetter.
Act for the naturalisation of certain persons in the colony of New Zealand [15 September 1855] (http://www.nzlii.org/nz/legis/hist_act/na185519v1855n1308.pdf, accessed 16 August 2018)
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2222/141/27)
Correspondence vol. 10, letter from Julius von Haast, 9 December 1862
